paper_abstract: Lambek grammars provide a useful tool for studying formal and natural languages. The generative power of unidirectional Lambek grammars equals that of context-free grammars. However, no feasible algorithm was known for deciding membership in the corresponding formal languages. In this paper we present a polynomial algorithm for deciding whether a given word belongs to a language generated by a given unidirectional Lambek grammar.
paper_title: Unidirectional Lambek Grammars in Polynomial Time
